DOC.brief_summary: The etiology immune-mediated diabetes mellitus ( IMD ) remain unclear . However , previous study indicate autoimmunity may result dysfunction natural killer T cell ( NK-T cell ) . Newly diagnose patient IMD show laboratory significantly low NK-T cell normal control . Other study show oral administration lactobacillus boost NK-T cell activity child HIV without side effect . Our objective evaluate effect lactobacillus administration NK-T cell activity patient IMD
DOC.brief_title: Lactobacillus Plantarum Therapy NK-T Cell Deficiency
DOC.criteria: Recently diagnose ( within last 6 month ) patient immunemediated ( type 1 ) diabetes
